医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的移动应用程序旨在弥合自闭症患者的沟通差距加泰罗尼亚大学 (UOC) 和 Parc Taulí 大学医院的研究人员开发了一款移动应用程序，该应用程序可以为与患有自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 的儿童或成人互动的人们汇编和提供有价值的信息和建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/New-mobile-app-aims-to-bridge-the-gap-in-communication-for-people-with-ASD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/New-mobile-app-aims-to-bridge-the-gap-in-communication-for-people-with-ASD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b458f1f2-2cf9-4ace-b2bc-1d5d7dee4f83 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 13:29:20 -0400 New mobile app aims to bridge the gap in communication for people with ASD
健康的乳房脂肪可以预防侵袭性乳腺癌研究人员找到了一个可能的解释，解释为什么较高的乳腺密度和较高的年龄会增加患乳腺癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Healthy-breast-fat-may-protect-against-侵袭-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Healthy-breast-fat-may-protect-against-侵袭-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6883d866-e439-4ccc-90b5-b1ec68d2c49a Thu, 13 Jul 2023 13:22:15 -0400 Healthy breast fat may protect against invasive breast cancer
价值 1150 万美元的巨额捐款将使 FAU 能够找到淀粉样变性的治疗方法目前，淀粉样变性尚无法治愈，淀粉样变性是一种危及生命的疾病，可能存在于全身，包括心脏、肾脏、肝脏和大脑。最常见的局部形式淀粉样变性发生在大脑中，而且更为常见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Monumental-24115-million-gift-will-enable-FAU-to-find-a-cure-for-amyloidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Monumental-24115-million-gift-will-enable-FAU-to-find-a-cure-for-amyloidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4353b4c-417c-4086-9bd2-a881bea10aad Thu, 13 Jul 2023 13:17:13 -0400 Monumental $11.5 million gift will enable FAU to find a cure for amyloidosis
研究揭示了 COVID-19 感染如何导致妊娠晚期并发症香港科技大学（科大）和香港中文大学（中大）今天公布了突破性研究，揭示了 COVID-19 感染如何导致妊娠晚期并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Study-sheds-light-on-how-COVID-19-infection-may-lead-to-late-pregnancy-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Study-sheds-light-on-how-COVID-19-infection-may-lead-to-late-pregnancy-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18590c6f-66a3-4fe6-9558-90fd08084f52 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 13:11:30 -0400 Study sheds light on how COVID-19 infection may lead to late pregnancy complications
路易斯安那州立大学健康新奥尔良护理学院获得 HRSA 拨款，以应对医疗保健劳动力挑战卫生资源和服务管理局 (HRSA) 已在四年内向路易斯安那州立大学健康新奥尔良护理学院拨款 260 万美元，用于增加受过培训和准备的执业护士和助产士数量，以提供公平、文化一致、优质的初级保健服务、心理护理和助产士服务。为全州农村、城市、部落和服务欠缺地区代表性不足的人群提供健康和药物滥用障碍护理以及产妇保健服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/LSU-Health-New-Orleans-School-of-Nursing-receives-HRSA-grant-to-address-health-care-workforce-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/LSU-Health-New-Orleans-School-of-Nursing-receives-HRSA-grant-to-address-health-care-workforce-challenges.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83d465e0-3dd7-4adf-88fe-0bdf6d31f7b8 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 13:06:04 -0400 LSU Health New Orleans' School of Nursing receives HRSA grant to address health care workforce challenges
家庭血压监测可以减少心血管事件，节省医疗费用爱思唯尔发表在《美国预防医学杂志》上的一项新研究表明，从长远来看，扩大对美国成年人高血压患者的家庭血压监测可以大大减轻心血管疾病的负担，并节省医疗费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Home-blood-Pressure-monitoring-could-reduce-cardioangio-events-save-healthcare-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Home-blood-Pressure-monitoring-could-reduce-cardioangio-events-save-healthcare-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4045a48-8176-45db-abd3-fa8f901e7647 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 12:59:51 -0400 Home blood pressure monitoring could reduce cardiovascular events, save healthcare costs
“管道破裂”威胁着外科医生科学家的未来UVA Health 专家团队警告说，同时进行重要生物医学研究的外科医生正在努力获得研究资金，如果不采取措施，“破裂的管道”可能会导致外科医生科学家的灭亡，并减缓患者的创新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Broken-pipeline-threatens-future-of-surgeon-scientists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Broken-pipeline-threatens-future-of-surgeon-scientists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78875cd7-b054-4c30-9446-03e4862c89d6 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 12:43:26 -0400 'Broken pipeline' threatens future of surgeon-scientists
密歇根大学研究人员开发出无动物方法来生产大脑类器官密歇根大学的研究人员开发出一种人工培育微型大脑的方法；称为人脑类器官-；不含动物细胞，可以极大地改善神经退行性疾病的研究和最终治疗的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/UM-researchers-develop-animal-free-method-to- Produce-brain-organoids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/UM-researchers-develop-animal-free-method-to- Produce-brain-organoids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90ecc32c-a178-4901-a395-d09b205a24d5 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 11:37:14 -0400 U-M researchers develop animal-free method to produce brain organoids
开发全息数字人体模型来破译人类生命和健康的密码一项旨在彻底改变生命科学领域并提供对人体前所未有的见解的突破性研究项目已经宣布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Developing-a-holography-digital-mannequin-to-decipher-the-code-of- human-life-and-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Developing-a-holographic-digital-mannequin-to-decipher-the-code-of- human-life-and-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=feb40632-3d22-4fe1-ae95-3614558f20ac Thu, 13 Jul 2023 11:06:00 -0400 Developing a holographic digital mannequin to decipher the code of human life and health
纳米生物技术的伦理：呼吁全球监管假肢被思想所感动。侵袭性脑癌的靶向治疗。具有增强视力或仿生耳朵的士兵。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/The-ethics-of-nanobiotechnology-A-call-for-global-regulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/The-ethics-of-nanobiotechnology-A-call-for-global-regulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db76fe3a-284c-4fa2-a6f5-9c30f1868ead Thu, 13 Jul 2023 10:56:30 -0400 The ethics of nanobiotechnology: A call for global regulation
